title: Help me
body: Can u guys help me how to change my password? I forgot my email to that lol account. Btw. I think that my lol account got hacked because even though I put the right password, it's not accepting.

replies.body: THIS SAME THING HAPPENED TO ME. MY ACCOUNT NAME IS "ARMINELE" , IVE EMAILED RIOT PLENTY OF TIMES TRYING TO SEE WHAT IS WRONG WITH MY ACCOUNT BECAUSE FOR SOME REASON MY PASSWORD DOES NOT WORK. When I go to recover password, it doesnt even recognize it as an existing account. I cant even play league of legends anymore because of this. I have spent so much time in this game on my arminele account its not even funny. I put a ticket in,and I cant even reply to the emails. so bs man..
You should submit a account recovery [ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)and they work with you to recover the account.
I did that but they never replied back.

I looked into this for you and see that a specialist responded to your ticket with some follow up questions on Tuesday.  Be sure to get back to him, and he'll be able to continue helping out.  Good luck!
I also did the same thing, but when I hit reply it doesn't send it saying that you cannot reply to the emails.

Make sure that your ticket was submitted through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), which allows you to select your own email address. This helps if you don't have access to the email registered to the account or can't access the ticketing center.  I hope that helps!
I check on my recovery email but it's not there still. It's been like 2 weeks now./
I believe it was on the account recovery form. I still dont understand how my account just vanished though .
